entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind light except gusting to 70 km/h near thunderstorms early this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
